arts.ttl: Derby County EFL squad list confirmed as trio's absence explained
arts.sum: Corey Blackett-Taylor, Curtis Nelson and Conor Washington have all been left off the list with Derby naming a 22-man squad for the rest of the campaign. Washington has been left off the list and has not kicked a ball for the club this season.

arts.ttl: QPR thrash Derby as Eustace learns about scale of task at hand
arts.sum: John Eustace was given a painful demonstration of the size of the task he has to save Derby from relegation as his new side slumped to a 4-0 loss at QPR.

arts.ttl: John Eustace makes frank Derby County admission as heavy QPR defeat puts Rams in danger zone
arts.sum: We didn't get it, but we'll start Monday and get right around the group and the boys will have a good week's training going into the next game. The way the lads kept going there at the end was pleasing, but we've got a lot of hard work on the training pitch now.

Ilias Chair scored twice – his first goals of the season – as QPR cruised to a seventh win in their past eight home matches. Here’s how we rated each Rangers player in the 4-0 thrashing of Derby. Paul Nardi: 6 Had very little to do in a match Rangers dominated. Jimmy Dunne: 7 A […] The post QPR v Derby player ratings appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v QPR as low scores underline huge John Eustace task
arts.sum: Nathaniel Mendez-Laing: The former Cardiff winger had one of Derby's best chances in the first half but his shot was diverted past the post. After a quiet opening period in which neither side created a chance of note in the first quarter, the game burst into life in the 21st minute when Ryan Nyambe's throw caused problems for Ebou Adams.

arts.ttl: John Eustace shown size of task he has at Derby in heavy away defeat to QPR
arts.sum: Ilias Chair scored twice, with Koki Saito and Ronnie Edwards also on target on a disastrous first day at the office for the new Rams boss.

arts.ttl: John Eustace picks his first Derby County team new era begins with triple change and duo miss out
arts.sum: Derby: Zetterstrom, Nyambe, Langas, Clarke, Elder; Osborn, Adams; Mendez-Laing, Yates, Harness; Salvesen With the changes that have been made, Derby are expected to play a 4-2-3-1 system, with Jacob Widell-Zetterstrom in goal behind the back four of Nyambe, Sondre Langas, Matt Clarke and Callum Elder.

arts.ttl: How to watch QPR vs Derby County - TV channel, live stream, kick-off time
arts.sum: Yes, the club are without a win in nine games and sit outside the Championship relegation zone on goal difference, but there is a new manager at Pride Park and John Eustace will be in charge when the Rams go to Loftus Road to play QPR. What time does QPR vs Derby County kick off?

arts.ttl: Derby County investment latest - John Eustace comments, David Clowes stance and talks held - Derbyshire Live
arts.sum: "There might be a prospect of investors, but I know the club is working very hard to bring more investment in," he said. John Eustace has acknowledged Derby County are working to bring more investment into the club.

arts.ttl: Former Derby County manager Wayne Rooney set to battle with Steven Gerrard for new job
arts.sum: Rooney, who managed Derby from 2021 to 2022, is the fifth favourite to take over from Clement, with odds of 5/1. Former Derby County manager Wayne Rooney is among the bookmakers' favourites to replace Phillippe Clement at Rangers as pressure continues to mount on the Belgian.
